relevant_findings.HEENT: Eyes anicteric, OP clear, moist, without lesions, no palpable lymphadenopathy, thick neck, JVP flat
relevant_findings.pulmonary: Clear to auscultation bilaterally, no wheezes/rales/rhonchi
relevant_findings.abdominal: Obese, soft, tender diffusely to deep palpation
relevant_findings.neurological: Alert and oriented x3, cranial nerves intact, strength symmetric in upper extremities and lower extremities, sensation symmetric, coordination intact, gait normal, mood/affect appropriate
relevant_findings.skin: No rash, no lesions; midline incision scar on abdomen
